name: 🍕Pizza Frenzy📦(F5LAYD-EDITION)
description: Pizza Frenzy is a fun puzzle game that challenges you to manage your own pizza delivery empire! Reflexes and quick thinking to juggle all orders. This dynamic game will make you click with characteristic actions and pattern matching. Telegram - https://t.me/f5layd_studio Installation by F5LAYD The latest version of the game 🎮
